xct_t Class Reference
[Running Out of Log Space]

Inherits smlevel_1.

Collaboration diagram for xct_t:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A transaction. Internal to the storage manager.

This class may be used in a limited way for the handling of out-of-log-space conditions. See Running Out of Log Space.

Examples:

log_exceed.cpp.
